answers.answer: Hi,What initial diagnostic tests were done? This could be due to a variety of issues as mentioned such as certain foods, periodontal disease, dry mouth, tobacco products, and underlying medical conditions such as infection, chronic bronchitis, postnasal drip, chronic sinusitis, diabetes and even gastrointestinal/liver/kidney disease. Treatment depends primarily on the cause of the condition, and it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: I read Jaritto's (20 year old) case and it is exactly my experience. Please help. **** smell comes through my mouth. I have been to doctors and tried diets. Please help.
title: I SMELL LIKE POO
